attributes.review: This app is extremely slow I open the app and it’s just a black screen it deleted 4 of my apps for no reason I have to get a new iPhone cause of this stupid app I can’t delete the app ... I’ve powered off my phone noting works I hope you take a moment to think about the side affects :((
attributes.title: Worst app ..🤮🤮

attributes.review: Not only does it barely have a purpose, it glitches out and quits you from the app every minute. Other people have this issue too. Apps are meant to serve a purpose, this really barely does. Waste of space. Apple is supporting trump by having this on here, so therefore apple supports homophobia, transphobia, racism, and fascism.
attributes.title: The worst app on the App Store

attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I can support trump, but them my phone glitched! It turned off for 5 minutes and then when it finally turned back on, my lock screen was A NAKED CHEETO! This is the most disgusting thing I’ve ever seen. Don’t download this app. I also managed to see a dancing golden weenie😳 oh to be Helen Keller😪
attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes➖👄➖

attributes.review:
Sooooo, I got this app for funsys anddd likeee, no one told me that it was run by a mean Cheeto dude. It smelled bad, like ew. It killed my grandma and my dog, so I’m kinda mad. And last but not least they DO NOT like jazz, who even🤦‍♀️. 100% wouldn’t recommend, if only zero stars were a thing😔but oh well. 

Gotta go walk my pet rock and water my shoesss.

Best wishes to all, except the mean Cheeto dude😚✌️
attributes.title: ✨✨not for me✨✨

attributes.review: I really don’t like this app because it has to me that it has been an bad app and I just honestly feel like my pet starfish wouldn’t like this app because it is really bad because it doesn’t fit right with My pet crab and my crab will eat you so I’m sorry I really don’t like this app
attributes.title: Just a disgusting app🤢

attributes.review: I am disgusted from seeing what’s on this app...  moldy Cheetos? Disgusting.  I could smell The aroma from through my phone, and almost fainted.  Even my dog passed out, and my mother is across the room vomiting. Even my neighbor could smell it.  Now I’m going to have to deep clean my house.  My flowers wilted, and my tree fell.  Leaving a 1-star review. Sorry not sorry.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible...

attributes.review: I almost vomited when I opened this app. It didn’t seem secure and was immediately sending me unwanted text messages about his campaign which in other apps, requires consent first. The app seems to be crawling with bugs and is overall, a terrible app. I demand that the Apple store removes this gross app immediately.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I got this app to stay updated with mr. cheeto- I mean trump. and while I was scrolling it ATE MY DOG. I thought it was a fluke but then it called me “a bucked tooth ni**er” and threw my phone in the toilet. I thought it couldn’t get any worse but it actually started spitting on me and I ended up having to curb stomp my phone. I HIGHLY dislike this app and I am looking for a lawyer.
attributes.title: GIVE ME MY CAT BACK

attributes.review: I’m not very educated so when I saw an app for our amazing president I immediately thought was going to be easy to use. Specially considering that I know for a fact a lot of his followers aren’t very smart. So you can understand my frustrations when I say it was very difficult to use
attributes.title: So hard to use

attributes.review: I refuse to support a racist, misogynistic, xenophobic, and absolutely disgusting man. How dare he even have an app? Really App Store? It also takes an incredibly long time to load. As I was trying to figure out when the next rally was, but it took far too long and my patience was wearing thin. I DO NOT recommend. Get this cheeto’s app off the App Store.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE AND DISGUSTING APP
